name: Hellsweeper VR
abstract: Hellsweeper VR is an intense first-person action-combat experience. Gain mastery of your weapons and elemental magic, and fight of hell's twisted souls. Dare to descend into hell.

detail.app_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean
detail.app_release_note:
Hey Hellsweepers!

A massive thank you to each and every one of you for supporting Hellsweeper VR! It’s been a thrilling week since launch, and your feedback has been invaluable.

Our first patch contains a critical fix for the Co-op bug that prevented some players from inviting friends and receiving invites.
We’re hard at work addressing Week 1 feedback, from game balancing, bug fixes, controls to server stability and more. We’ll be rolling out a major update soon!

Keep the feedback coming, and above all – happy hell sweeping!

Crafted with Love,
Mixed Realms Team
Join us on Discord.
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO 4 Pro, PICO 4, PICO Neo3 Link
